title: Growing up in Bendigo
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: Bendigo - it's got everything you want
description: Bendigo - short MTV style doco compiled from short interviews with teenagers on the streets of Bendigo. Subject matter includes how they feel about living in Bendigo, their hopes, aspirations, and whether they would like to stay in the town they grew up in as adults
